# tk-chart



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The TkChart component allows users to visualize data in various chart formats using Chart.js.

## Properties

## Methods

### `getBase64Image() => Promise<string | undefined>`

Get base64 image of the chart

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<string>`



### `getCanvas() => Promise<HTMLCanvasElement | undefined>`

Get the canvas element

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<HTMLCanvasElement>`



### `getChart() => Promise<any>`

Get the chart instance

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<any>`



### `refresh() => Promise<void>`

Refresh the chart

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
